name: Remember The Fallen
description:
Remember The Fallen is war memorial walking simulator. Discover hidden poppy flowers, place them on graves and pay honour to those who lay rest.

Inspired by the imagery of the attomic attacks on Japan in WW2 and Charlie Chaplins speech at the end of The Great Dictator.

=======

“A fantastic environment with a bit of emotional time killing” –Eurogamer

 “The slow pace and overall tone is very well managed, evoking the sadness of the devastation and death before you” – Indie Statik

“It’s not the most upbeat game you’ll play this year, but it’s a strong contender for the most emotional” – 100% Indie
